info.name: Fuses
info.description: Shows the time from somebody's timezone

changelog.title: Announcements
items: I am planning to relase 0.4.0, where it will be a very ambixious update. It isn't done as for now, need some bug fixes, and I wont reveal what I will add, but it will be very poggers.
The reason as to why I am releasing it is because I've added some quality of life changed, fixed some bugs, improved error handling, and some small new features

changelog.title: New features
items: Animations! I've finally added animation in some places like for example the timezone selector

changelog.title: Changes
items: Added a button to select the user instead of just clicking the user in the user selector

changelog.title: Fixes
items: Better error handling in almost all files
Fixed a bug where you needed to search in lowercase in the user selector
Fixed a bug where it wouldn't display the timer icon in the timestamp
